timeline.message:
Replace try/finally with try-with-resources.

Implement the try-with-resources construct available in Java 7+ where applicable.

replies.bodyText: @ctubbsii thanks for the info. I'm not that familiar with the use of var at the moment so I will read up on it a bit and then see if I can apply it where appropriate. You can take another look once I push another update.

replies.bodyText: That's fine. We can merge this without those suggestions. They aren't necessary.
